_PAGE_FILTER_FLOAT_ARGUMENTS_:
# Arguments: 
value (Any): The numeric value to be formatted
[suffix=""] (String): A suffix to be added after the numeric value
[digits=2] (Number): The number of decimal places after the decimal point
[digitGrouping=true] (Boolean): A flag indicating whether digit grouping should be applied (thousands separator)
_PAGE_FILTER_FLOAT_DESCRIPTION_: The filterFloat function formats numeric values according to the specified parameters. It takes a numeric value and returns it as a string with the specified number of decimal places, a suffix, and optional digit grouping (thousands separator). If the numeric value is not provided (null or undefined), an empty string is returned.
